page.title: 06PAGE 5 CONTINUED.
page.content: Lowther Gardens provides well laid out gardens,tennis courts,bowling greens,putting and crazy golf.There is also a modern theatre where a performance is generally showing,and a cafe where you can obtain refreshments and snacks. The present windmill was built in 1805 and it's original sails were 45ft. long and covered in canvas. Lytham windmill is about 50ft. high and 50ft. wide.The windmill has not ground grain since 1919 when it was gutted by fire.The windmill is an attractive landmark for tourists,but still there have not been enough efforts made to restore it.It always seems to look in need of a coat of paint and the idea of transforming the inside into a museum has not yet been carried out.
